system.description: This is a suit primarily composed of large metal plates—the largest being the breastplate—linked together with chain mail. Plate mail gives a character an armor class of 3. It is the best armor that can be bought second hand or looted, since suit armor must be custom made.
system.unidentifiedDesc: This is a suit primarily composed of large metal plates—the largest being the breastplate—linked together with chain mail. Plate mail gives a character an armor class of 3. It is the best armor that can be bought second hand or looted, since suit armor must be custom made.
